query:
SELECT 
                type as issue_type, 
                severity,
                COUNT(*) as count,
                GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT message) as messages
            FROM issues
            WHERE job_id = ?
            GROUP BY type, severity
            ORDER BY 
                CASE severity 
                    WHEN 'critical' THEN 1 
                    WHEN 'warning' THEN 2 
                    ELSE 3 
                END,
                count DESC
